One of the best games ever made, hands down.

It is super fun!




VALVE CANT COUNT TO 3!!!!!
Great puzzle game with an endearing story, a game I keep coming back to

the story is nice and neat package to wrap up the portal games and this being the last it was well done with fun puzzles. it's multiplayer is it's own package featuring a story of it's own that explains why portal ended the way it did and of coarse we can't forget the custom rooms that you can build really I can't build well on there (I just lack the creativity) so Ill leave it to you.

Playing portal 2 on steam was the first game I have ever played on pc and was also the most fun time I have had gaming in a long time. My only problem with portal 2 is that sadly it is most likely the last game in this amazing series.
Fun game, good puzzles. Absolutely frustrating to play co-op in the best way.
Very good game with some fun physics
This game is amazing i play almost all the time it is so fun
Portal 2 is a very fun and interactive game where you can play with friends and just have fun!
One of the best games I've ever played in my life.
Very story rich and amazing puzzle game

Portal 2 remains one of my favorite games of all time despite being several years old now. The campaign is short but very satisfying, the humor is great and the puzzles are fun. 10 runes out of 10
It is a very epic and cool game 10/10 the story was amazing i would play it if you like story type of games and you have to use your big brain sometimes for this game but overall it is good

Very fun, has mild bloodshed, awesome story line.
great thinking game with great story and many robots your gonna like

tbh only good game from like 2012 thats still fun today that hasnt had updates

This games does almost everything the first game does better. The story is much more longer and has more of a narrative to it compared to the first game. All the characters are hilarious in this game. The advanced maps from the first game are gone, but they have been replaced by co-op, which I would argue is a lot more fun. Overall, it is a great game. Definitely pick it up, but play the first game before.
brilliant writing, amazing gameplay. exceptional game.
